lowerCourt: United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit

wikiData.title: Warden v. Hayden
wikiData.Prior: Defendant convicted; conviction reversed on appeal, ''Hayden v. Warden'', 363 [[F.2d]] [https://law.justia.com/cases/federal/appellate-courts/F2/363/647/264256/ 647] ([[4th Cir.]] 1966); [[Certiorari|cert]]. granted, {{ussc|385|926|1966|el=no}}.
wikiData.Holding: The distinction prohibiting seizure of items of only evidential value and allowing seizure of instrumentalities, fruits, or contraband is no longer accepted as being required by the Fourth Amendment
wikiData.LawsApplied: [[Fourth Amendment to the United States Constitution|U.S. Const. amend. IV]]
